snippet: David Lowery, having edited films for indie directors like Shane Carruth and Amy Siemetz, returns to the director’s chair for “Ain’t Them Bodies Saints.”
abstract: David Lowery, having edited films for indie directors like Shane Carruth and Amy Siemetz, returns to director’s chair himself for new film, Ain’t Them Bodies Saints, starring Casey Affleck and Rooney Mara.
lead_paragraph: David Lowery, having edited films for indie directors like Shane Carruth and Amy Siemetz, returns to the director’s chair for “Ain’t Them Bodies Saints.”

headline.seo: David Lowery Directs ‘Ain’t Them Bodies Saints’
headline.main: A Team Player Becomes the Captain
headline.print_headline: A Team Player Becomes the Captain
